EmailTemplate.name: Winter Olympics 2014.Sochi Tech Support Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Enjoy Happy Landings at Sochi this Winter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://aerospace.honeywell.com>
Here to ensure a happy landing at Sochi this Winter
Honeywell Aerospace will be available throughout February to support operators and customers flying to Sochi. With resources located strategically across the region we have the right team in place to help you overcome any technical or service issues, including in-country Field Service Engineers and Customer and Product Support.
In addition, Honeywell will have mechanical and avionics systems spares available to manage any potential issues that may arise. Operators can also expect additional shift coverage from our Technical Operations Center to assist with Aircraft on Ground (AOG) situations.
Our in-region support team will be on hand between February 7th – 23rd to deliver product and service excellence to customers visiting Sochi.
Honeywell Sochi 2014 - Technical Support
Mechanical support/FSE
Sergey Zhukov
Location: Moscow
Office Phone: +74957953108
Cell Phone: + 7 985 761 6092
Sergey.Zhukov@Honeywell.com <mailto:Sergey.Zhukov@Honeywell.com>
